content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

 Tank Type:- Horizontal
Operating System :- Fully Auto / Semi Auto/ Manual
Plating Length :- 1300 / 1800 / 2200.
Plating Dia. :- 120 – 400 mm dia. Max
Immersion:- > 50%
Current :- 50 Amps. / dm. sq.
Cathode :- Carbon brush / Copper Belt
Anode :- Titanium Baskets
Plating Time:- 06 microns / 25 minutes.
Anode Adjustment :- As per OS.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: A fundamental and vital technique to begin the plating process, and this is why we fabricate to simplify Nickel plating requirements so you may get started quickly. The process of depositing nickel on a base cell is known as nickel electroplating. Before plating can begin, the parts must be clean and free of dirt, corrosion, and flaws. A mixture of heat treatment, cleaning, masking, pickling, and etching may be employed to clean and protect the item during the plating process.
